subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] More stuff from David the Tech.
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
The HAARP facility is inactive and has been so since April 5, 2011. I found
out over the weekend through some of my contacts that there hasn't even been
anyone on site for quite a while. How could they be causing any of this?

Zack
